Whetstone Sons of Liberty Silent Eagle Knife

Whetstone Sons of Liberty Silent Eagle Knife
Tanga Featured Deal
Whetstone Sons of Liberty Silent Eagle Knife

Compact & Stylish.

$19.99

Free Shipping & Free Returns

Estimated delivery May 1 - May 5

Share This Deal

Product Details

The Sons of Liberty is a stunning knife from Whetstone Cutlery features numerous impressive characteristics. From its bolster engraved with a stunning image of a silent eagle to its inlaid pakkawood handle, this eye-catching knife is a finely crafted show piece.

Additional Information
  • Blade:Stainless Steel
  • Full tangLength: 3.5 inches
  • Handle: Pakkawood inlay
  • Engraved eagle bolster
  • Length: 3.5 inches
  • Overall dimensions: 7.75 × .625 × 1.25 inches
  • Nylon sheath with Velcro closure
  • Brand New
  • 30 Day Warranty
  • New
Shipping Information
  • Free Shipping!
  • Estimated delivery May 1 - May 5
  • Returns available within 30 days
  • Ships to U.S. (No AK/HI, No P.O. Boxes, and No Military Addresses)
